name: @gerhobbelt/benchmark
description: A benchmarking library that supports high-resolution timers & returns statistically significant results.
author: Mathias Bynens <mathias@qiwi.be>

scripts.doc-orig: docdown benchmark.js doc/README.md style=github title="Benchmark.js v${npm_package_version}" toc=categories url=https://github.com/bestiejs/benchmark.js/blob/${npm_package_version}/benchmark.js
scripts.doc: docdown benchmark.js doc/README.md style=github title="Benchmark.js v1.1.1-1" toc=categories url="https://github.com/GerHobbelt/benchmark.js/blob/master/benchmark.js" && gulp patch-version && gulp

comment: added glob to devdeps to fix crash in gulp on node 8.0 due to antique vinyl-fs and glob loading outdated graceful-fs
